entries.notes: Arrangement by Boccherini himself? No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. For comment as to authenticity, see No. 250. Arrangement of the whole of the trio in C Major Op. 54 no. 4 of 1796 (No. 116).

Arrangement by Boccherini himself? No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. For comment as to authenticity, see No. 250. Arrangement of movements from trio Op. 14: first movement from trio in F Major Op. 14 no. 1 of 1772 (No. 95, Incipit No. 168), second movement from trio in D Major Op. 14 no. 4 of 1772 (No. 98, Incipit No. 180), third movement from trio in C Minor Op. 14 no. 2 of 1772 (No. 96, Incipit No. 173), fourth movement from trio in D Major Op. 14 no. 4 of 1772 (No. 98, Incipit No. 181).

partial_notes: Both entries are marked as unpublished arrangements with questionable attribution to Boccherini himself
